text: wmn ayatih aldalt ealaa qudratih albahrt wsltanh alqahir alsufun aleazimat kaljibal tajri fi albhr. 'iin yasha allah aladhi 'ajraa hadhih alsufun fi albahr yuskn alryh, ftabq alsufun swakn ealaa zahr albahr la tjry, 'iina fi jary hadhih alsufun wwqwfha fi albahr bqdrt allah laezat whjjana byint ealaa qudrat allah likuli sabaar ealaa taeat allh, shakur lnemh wafdalh
